articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jang Jo Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jang Jo Il
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Head of the National Symphony Orchestra Jang Jo Il, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and people's artiste, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Prensa Latina Delegation of Cuba Here
articles.content:
Prensa Latina Delegation of Cuba Here
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Prensa Latina News Agency of Cuba led by President Luis Enrique Gonzalez Acosta arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Sports Ministry Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Sports Ministry Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports led by Minister Kim Il Guk returned home Monday after taking part in the 6th Meeting of Sports Ministers held in Russia.

articles.title: New Kind of Beer Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Beer Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Beer Factory in the DPRK recently began producing wheat beer.
					 In this regard, Han Hyong Chol, a department head of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 The first sale of wheat beer will be made at the upcoming 2nd Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Fest.
					
					 The beer, brewed from barley and wheat, is a top-fermented one peculiar in flavor and taste and expected to get popular at the fest.

articles.title: Botanical Dictionary Compiled in DPRK
articles.content:
Botanical Dictionary Compiled in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Botanists of the DPRK newly compiled the two-volume "Dictionary of Systematic Botanical Names".
					 Carried in the dictionary are myriads of names of seed plants and spore-bearing plants, grouped into genera and species, in five languages together with their botanical names.
					
					 According to Prof. and Dr. Ri Yong Jae, a researcher of the Botany Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, the dictionary is worthy of national treasure as it is not a multilingual one merely for plant names, but an all-inclusive botanical dictionary of new type.

articles.title: Drama "Molten Iron Falls" Staged in Sariwon
articles.content:
Drama "Molten Iron Falls" Staged in Sariwon
 Sariwon, July 17 (KCNA) -- Drama "Molten Iron Falls" has been staged in Sariwon of North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK since July 14.
					 The drama, produced by the National Theatrical Troupe, makes a vivid artistic depiction of the indomitable mental power and the working spirit of the working class at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex who rounded off the Juche iron production system in the do-or-die spirit and by dint of self-reliance and self-development to uphold the Party's leadership with increased iron production.
					
					 Among the audience were officials and people from all walks of life, and youth and students in the province.

articles.title: Sojourn of Delegation of Korean Youth and Students from Japan
articles.content:
Sojourn of Delegation of Korean Youth and Students from Japan
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Korean youths and students in Japan led by Kim Chol Ho visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President, the members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved there, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members.
					
					 Then, they toured the revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the head of the delegation said that the life of President was a brilliant one of the peerlessly great man dedicated to the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness, renewing their will to hold the great leaders in high esteem forever and powerfully accelerate the patriotic cause of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), true to the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Korean Revolution Museum, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Japan's Wicked Intention of Talking about "Threat from North Korea"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Japan's Wicked Intention of Talking about "Threat from North Korea"
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe is busy building up atmosphere for tightening sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK over its measure for self-defence.
					 Days ago, touring Europe Abe met heavyweights of the European Union and heads of state of different countries to claim escalation of pressure and sanctions upon the DPRK, describing its measure as "threat to international peace and security" and "grave challenge".
					
					 Such behavior of Japan inciting confrontation, rather than concerning about the tense situation in the region, reveals the black-hearted intention to seek its own profit by maximizing "threat" from someone.
					
					 These days Japan is getting evermore undisguised in the moves to revise the Constitution for revival of militarism and overseas expansion.
					
					 Abe, in May this year, proposed the first "timetable for revising the Constitution", declaring that Japan would revise Article 9 of the Constitution and enforce the new Constitution in 2020.
					
					 In June, the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan announced that it would enact a bill for amending the Constitution within this year and take a vote for it at the Diet session to be held in the spring of 2018.
					
					 However, the moves of the right-wing reactionaries of Japan are facing the strong opposition at home and abroad.
					
					 Early in July the LDP led by Abe suffered a bitter defeat in the Tokyo Metropolitan Assembly election and its support rate is rapidly declining. The reality casts dark cloud to the revision of the Constitution and poses threat to existence of the "Abe regime".
					
					 There is a saying "Want is the master of mankind."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are going to calm down the strong protest against the amendment of the Constitution and realize the ambition for overseas expansion and tide over the political crisis at the extreme phase under the pretence of "threat from north Korea".
					
					 This is very cunning and wicked intention as befitting Japs.
					
					 Japan can never cover up its black-hearted intention.
					
					 It is by no means accidental that Japanese people are now contending that "evacuation drill from north Korean missile", staged under the sponsorship of the government, has no sense of the reality and it is aimed to propagandize threat from north Korea and make an outside enemy and thus create an atmosphere of internal unity" and that "the government would want to say it is impossible to check the threat from north Korea unless it revises the Constitution."
					
					 The international community clearly remembers the criminal acts of Japan which has neutralized the Peace Constitution little by little, vociferating about the regional situation, and watches with vigilance the tendency of Japan which is persistently following its criminal past.
					
					 Japan had better give up the bad habit of faulting others.

articles.title: DPRK Will Triumph under Leadership of Kim Jong Un: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Triumph under Leadership of Kim Jong Un: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the fifth anniversary of the conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The editorial says that the conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on Kim Jong Un on July 17, Juche 101 (2012) was an expression of the absolute trust and loyalty of the service personnel and people to him and a noteworthy event which promised prosperity of the powerful Paektusan nation and the final victory of the cause of building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the peerlessly great man and the sun of the 21st century praised by the whole world, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The past five years are the glorious period in which a new heyday was opened in all fields of the revolution and construction and the national power and strategic position of the country were put on the highest phase and beautiful dream and ideal of the people have come true under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. The period witnessed the greatness of Kim Jong Un, great revolutionary boundlessly faithful to the idea and cause of the leaders, prominent leader steering the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of the Songun revolution to steady victories and the peerless patriot devoting himself to the country and its people.
					
					 Thanks to his resolute decision, tested leadership and devoted efforts, the building of the most powerful country has been confidently stepped up according to the timetable fixed by the Workers' Party of Korea and the dawn of victory of socialism breaks on this land.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the Party members, service personnel and people to further display the invincible might of the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, bearing in mind the great national pride and honor holding him as Marshal of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Defense Secretary's Cynical Ploy Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Defense Secretary's Cynical Ploy Denounced
Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- U.S. Defense Secretary Mattis in his official appearance on July 6 described the DPRK's ICBM test-fire as "very grave threat," claiming that the U.S. is dealing with the "nuclear issue of north Korea with economic and diplomatic efforts". He pretended the U.S. was not seeking military conflict. Earlier, at a press conference and a hearing of the U.S. House of Representatives, Mattis said that a war against "north Korea would be the worst calamity," building public opinion that "the U.S. was seeking a diplomatic solution."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Mattis is the peerless bellicose element well known to be a "war-maniac" and "rabid dog" in the overseas aggression wars.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, that such warmonger talked about "non-military counteraction" and "diplomatic solution".
					
					 No matter how noisily the U.S. talks about the "non-military counteraction" and "diplomatic solution", no one would heed to the remarks.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know that the rival is the nuclear power in the East and the worldwide rocket power, before sounding somebody's opinion.
					
					 Such third-rate plot of old warmonger Mattis can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. chooses a military option after misjudging a high degree of vigilance and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK, the former will not escape the bitterest end. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers should not resort to a cynical ploy, clearly understanding their pitiful position.

articles.title: Removal of Evils, Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Removal of Evils, Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on July 14 carried an editorial in demand of the removal of all evils and the release of prisoners of conscience.
					 Noting that the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes produced a large number of prisoners of conscience, the editorial stressed that the authorities should severely punish the Park Geun Hye group of traitors, remove all the evils and release all the prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet President Kim Il Sung's work "The U.S. Imperialist Army of Aggression Must Withdraw Unconditionally from South Korea" on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 The work published on Oct. 1, Juche 63 (1974) indicates the idea that it is the primary issue to be solved in settling the issue of Korea's reunification to deprive the U.S. troops present in south Korea of berets "UN forces" and completely withdraw them.
					
					 It also deals with the idea that Korea is one and it can never divide into two forever as the Korean nation is the homogeneous nation.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 7.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Regional Body
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted on a website of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria on July 5.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Remembered by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Remembered by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung took place in Spain, Denmark, the UK, Serbia, Uganda, Peru and Mexico from July 4 to 8 on the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 Figures of the Communist Party of the People of Spain and the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea praised the President as the pioneer of the era of independence who indicated the way for mankind to follow and as the world's elder statesman who led the cause of global independence, holding aloft the banner of the cause of independence against imperialism all his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said that Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. and Japan imperialism in one generation, built the DPRK into the socialist county independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence and contributed to achieving national reunification and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the most brilliant feat among the ones the President performed was that he fathered the immortal Juche idea, adding that the feats he performed still have great impact on the struggle of the people in African countries for building a new society.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, the chairman of the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk and the president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il stressed that the DPRK, the country of single-minded unity where all the people are firmly united around the Party and the leader, is the military power which the U.S. fear most and this great country could emerge in the world thanks to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They said that though Kim Il Sung passed away, his sacred august name will always be remembered by all people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Russian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Russian Figures
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Russia on the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Seminars and book and photo exhibition were held in the city of Sankt-Peterburg from July 6 to 14 and an opening ceremony of a DPRK book and handicraft exhibition took place in Arseniyev city, Maritime Territory.
					
					 On display at the book and photo exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, books and photos introducing the DPRK and handicrafts showing the wisdom and talents of the Korean people were also displayed at the venues of the events.
					
					 The director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man who performed the immortal feats in the human history by defeating the invasion and interference of foreign forces and turning the DPRK into a socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 The chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism stressed that the greatest feat among the ones the President performed is that he successfully settle the issue of succession to the leadership.
					
					 The vice-mayor of the city of Arseniyev, Maritime Territory said that Kim Il Sung was the great man who was admired by the progressive people as the peerlessly statesman and that the tradition of the Russia-DPRK friendship the President had established is still carried forward.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Successful Test-launch of ICBM
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Successful Test-launch of ICBM
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 serves as thrilling thunderclap which blasted under the eyes of the U.S. imperialists and an event putting an end to its nuclear war threat.
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement made public on July 4 to hail the DPRK's successful test-launch of Hwasong-14.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The test-launch of Hwasong-14 was successfully conducted under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 With the test-launch, the DPRK passed through the final gate to rounding off its national nuclear force.
					
					 This also serves as a decisive and crucial contribution to defending peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 We sincerely congratulate respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Party, the state, the army and the people of the DPRK on the successful test-launch of Hwasong-14.

articles.title: DR Congolese Organization Demands U.S. Stop Pressure against DPRK
articles.content:
DR Congolese Organization Demands U.S. Stop Pressure against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- We demand the U.S. stop at once the anachronistic pressure upon the DPRK at once to defuse tension and create peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					 The Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo said this in a statement on June 26 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 Warmly congratulating the heroic Korean people who defeated the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the statement went on:
					
					 The U.S., far from drawing a lesson from its defeat in the Korean war, has ceaselessly resorted to sanctions and pressure and war maneuvers against the DPRK, shipping huge aggressive forces including nuclear weapons to south Korea.
					
					 The reality proves that it is very just for the DPRK when it has steadily bolstered up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence in every way to protect the sovereignty and the right to existence of the country and the nation.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could force its will on others with high-handedness and arbitrariness.
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear power in the East and a rocket power in Asia which no powerful enemies dare to provoke.
					
					 We extend full support to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving lasting peace on the peninsula, building a socialist power and reunifying the country by their own efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Jang Jo Il
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en terreno las gestiones del Complejo Automovilistico Sungri donde los funcionarios y los obreros aceleraron la produccion y el montaje de los accesorios de autos.
					  Recorriendo varios lugares, el se informo de los detalles de produccion.
					
					  En la reunion de consulta convocada en el terreno, se tomaron las medidas para fabricar los automoviles modernos de diversos modelos, que contribuiran al desarrollo economico del pais, al mejorar y completar los procesos productivos.
					
					  Por otra parte, Pak discutio los problemas presentados en la construccion de los objetos para la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
articles.content:
Comienza la construccion de Fabrica de Abono Fosforico de Sunchon
Sunchon, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Se construira en Corea la nueva Fabrica de Abono Fosforico de Sunchon.
					  Esta planta cumplira el papel importante de incrementar la produccion agricola mediante el aumento de produccion de abono.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el terreno la ceremonia inaugural de su construccion.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y premier de la RPDC, el vicepresidente del CC del PTC, O Su Yong, el vicepremier y presidente del Comite Estatal de Planificacion, Ro Tu Chol, y otros.
					
					  Pronuncio el discurso inaugural el ministro de Industria Quimica, Jang Kil Ryong, y otros, las palabras de juramento.
					
					  Los oradores exhortaron a crear milagros e innovaciones sin precedentes en la construccion de la fabrica con el espiritu de fortalecerse con medios propios.

articles.title: Ryu Myong Son se reune con secretario internacional del partido mozambiqueno
articles.content:
Ryu Myong Son se reune con secretario internacional del partido mozambiqueno
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 13 las conversaciones entre el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ryu Myong Son, quien realiza una visita a la Republica de Mozambique al frente de una delegacion del PTC, y el secretario de relaciones internacionales del CC del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Mozambique.
					  El visitante informo que bajo la sabia direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, todo el ejercito y pueblo coreanos aceleran bien la construccion de una potencia socialista frustrando con la unidad monolitica y el principio de autofortalecimiento las brutales maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					  Expuso la invariable posicion del PTC de consolidar y desarrollar aun mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos partidos y paises con larga historia.
					
					  El secretario mozambiqueno dijo que estimula mucho al pueblo de su pais la imagen de la RPDC que bajo la sabia guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, avanza victoriosamente por el camino optado por si misma a pesar de la siniestra campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento de EE.UU.
					
					  Afirmo que las relaciones de amistad entre dos partidos y paises seguiran desarrollandose en cualesquier circunstancias.  
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes un miembro de la delegacion del PTC y las figuras importantes del CC del partido mozambiqueno.

articles.title: Presidente mongol expone voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones con la RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente mongol expone voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- El embajador coreano en Mongolia, Hong Kyu, se reunio el dia 11 con el presidente mongol Khaltmaa Battulga.
					En la ocasion, el dignatario mongol dijo que tuvo profunda impresion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea durante sus reiteradas visitas a Corea y encuentros con las delegaciones coreanas de alto rango que habian visitado a su pais.
					
					Afirmo que se esforzara en el futuro por desarrollar las relaciones entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Arriba a Pyongyang delegacion de Prensa Latina
articles.content:
Arriba a Pyongyang delegacion de Prensa Latina
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 17 a esta capital la delegacion de la Agencia Informativa Latinoamericana Prensa Latina de Cuba, encabezada por su presidente Luis Enrique Gonzales Acosta.
